TF035528-GEORGIA - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT
            CREDIT II,TF035443-GEORGIA - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT
            CREDIT II (SAC),TF032954-EASTERN EUROPE
            (GEORGIA,ARMENIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF021596-SECOND STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF020749-DUTCH BALANCE OF PAYMENTS
            SUPPORT TO GEORGIA

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the Second
            Structural Adjustment Credit Project is to consolidate the
            stabilization gains recently achieved and to strengthen the
            current economic recovery. The project will do this by
            supporting the implementation of the Government's
            reform program. The reform program aims at: a) strengthening
            public finance while maintaining a prudent monetary policy;
            b) developing the private sector; and c) alleviating
            poverty. Among key reforms are: tax revenue collection
            improvement; public spending restructuring; privatization
            acceleration; capital markets development; energy sector
            financial discipline improvement; banking sector
            restructuring; and reform the provision and financing of
            social services.
